title: How to level up to post in Forums
body: Im level 30 on my account why cant I post in the forums

replies.body: By making this exact post, in fact. You're level 30 now, happy posting!
I think that maybe he meant that on his other account, which is level 30, he can't post on the forums

AHHHHH, I'm still level 2, my sad sad life. 
{{champion:142}} is crying
ok, so on this post i can comment, but on another it says i need to be level 7
Interesting I was thinking the same thing
